channel.title: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)
channel.description: In Canada you only have to be 18 to drink can't wait,although i do just legally when i'm 18.

item.title: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:66, topic:183430”][quote author=Hiaburi link=topic=245111.msg2072129#msg2072129 date=1203767358]
Drinking in the right amounts can make you live longer, I agree with that one guy, I dont get why you can smoke at 18 but drink at 21 in the us…Ehm… also, isn’t it legal to smoke weed in Canada now also cause of some bill the forgot to pass allowing medical use or something?
[/quote]

http://www.medicalmarihuana.ca/possession.html

-Holic[/quote]

I seriously don’t know whats up with all these articles that keep saying it’s legal here.

It’s not legal. The Criminal Code of Canada and the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act both say it is illegal. My friends brother is going to court soon over possession of pot, here in Ontario.

And with the conservatives in power, it’ll NEVER be legal.

Read full topic
item.source: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)

[quote=“eVokki`, post:62, topic:183430”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=245111.msg2068719#msg2068719 date=1203578571]
You only have to be 5 to drink here. Do we win?

(The posted above me confuses drunk with shit stupid)
[/quote]

Only in your house with parental concent and it’s things such as wine…[/quote]

In any “private place”, no parental consent needed, and it’s any alcohol you wish.

But close

item.source: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)

item.title: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:55, topic:183430”][quote author=Niall link=topic=245111.msg2071417#msg2071417 date=1203733867]

I love how much bullshit the laws in the United States are.

21 to buy alcohol (regardless of percentage), 18 to buy tobacco products (yet it is not illegal to smoke them under 18).
Despite how much effort law enforcement puts into it, kids can still get beer/liquor and cigarettes.

The United States needs to get smart and look at the laws of other countries in order to stop being so fucking lame…

Well you need to be 18 to buy tobacco here, 16 to smoke it, so your not alone.
[/quote]

Are you sure? I thought there was only an age limit on buying, not possession or smoking?[/quote]

I’m fairly sure you need to be 16 to smoke it, although it would be difficult to get caught possessing it in public if your under 16.

Read full topic
item.source: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)

item.title: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Cheese_Police:

Despite how much effort law enforcement puts into it, kids can still get beer/liquor and cigarettes.

I think this problem is in every country; older people sell alcohol to youngsters with little higher price.
I have had no problems getting alcohol, last summer somebody always bought me alcohol if I paid about 1-2 euros extra.
But now I don’t have that problem anymore, I made fake IDs and they work in every place.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:46, topic:183430”]JD isn’t “technically” a bourbon, but it’s the same shit just made in the wrong place, essentially.

It’s not that I don’t like American Whisky, I drink Irish, Scotch AND Bourbon. It’s just that JD is shite. It’s the Microsoft of Whiskeys, the Diet Coke of Whiskeys. :D[/quote]

Hah, nice metafora.

Read full topic

item.title: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:41, topic:183430”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=245111.msg2069790#msg2069790 date=1203642831]
Jack Daniels tastes like shit, its the worst whiskey ever invented.

However, with coke, it tastes like candy.
[/quote]LOL, it’s one of the best Whiskey-brands out there. The only one that can even get close to its glory is Black Label, but i still prefer Daniels over it.[/quote]
imo i prefer ethanol but its not really a drink

item.title: You only have to be 18 to drink here :)
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“Gromit, post:42, topic:183430”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=245111.msg2070817#msg2070817 date=1203696839]

Jack Daniels tastes like shit, its the worst whiskey ever invented.

However, with coke, it tastes like candy.
[/quote]LOL, it’s one of the best Whiskey-brands out there. The only one that can even get close to its glory is Black Label, but i still prefer Daniels over it.

As I’m Irish I am obligated to tell you the JD is a terrible whiskey as, like most bourbons (Which aren’t even proper whiskey!), it’s as rough as a badgers arse.[/quote]

It’s not bourbon.
But anyways, it’s pretty useless to fight about something like that. Some people like scottish whiskey, some people like american whiskey.

Read full topic
